attributes.action: To Amend the 2003 criminal Justice sexual offences bill retrospectively
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We wish for an amendment in the law stating that if the offender admits raping or sexualy assaulting the victim after 2003 BUT the offences were before 2003 and this comes to light after the new 2003 criminal justice bill then the police and cps can enact on this evidence and act on any law in the 2003 justice bil that is relevant to the individual case eg: grooming and abuse of trust, The only time a british law was made retrospective was to bring Nazi war criminals to  face justice
